targets.expr: max(ALERTS{sloth_service="${service}", sloth_slo="${slo}", sloth_severity="page"}) or on() vector(0)

list.definition: query_result(( slo:objective:ratio{sloth_service="$service"} * on(sloth_id) group_left()   count by (sloth_id)  (slo:period_error_budget_remaining:ratio{sloth_service="$service", sloth_window="30d"})))
